attributes.action: perit competing postal services other than Royal Mail  to deliver to residential addresses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present in the UK in accordance with the Postal Services act (2000) only the Royal Mail are permitted to deliver letters and envelopes to residential addresses.

Due to legal restrictions third party postal services such as those offered by CitiPost, TNT and DHL must rely on the Royal Mail for delivery along the final Mile to residential addresses.

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to remove these legal restrictions and permit rival delivery companies license through postcomm to deliver a door to door service for residential customers.
